definition: victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)
to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither
to not be able to distinguish who's winning

sentences.english: Most of Tuesday's game hinged on the first inning.
sentences.chinese: 週二的比賽勝敗關鍵在於第一局。

sentences.english: It's a tough assignment, and it will either make or break her.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個艱鉅的任務，勝敗在此一舉。

sentences.english: Who do you feel can be the match-winner for Stoke and why?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲決定斯托克勝敗的人將是誰，以及理由。

sentences.english: The safety of America depends on the outcome of the battle in the streets of Baghdad.
sentences.chinese: 美國是否安全取決於巴格達巷戰的勝敗。

definition: to run a newspaper/to publish a newspaper
relatives/members of the same family, clan, tribe etc
to rely on/to base oneself on
to be in overall charge/to oversee
to conceal one's strengths and bide one's time (idiom)/to hide one's light under a bushel
